name: office_create_requests
query: INSERT INTO testing.Request (requestDate, productCode, productName, productFlavour, dueDate, requestState, expectedCount, previousCount, lastCount, notes, expectedGroundCount) VALUES ('{d.requestDate}', '{d.productCode}', '{d.productName}', '{d.productFlavour}', '{d.dueDate}', '{d.requestState}', '{d.expectedCount}', '{d.previousCount}', '{d.lastCount}', '{d.notes}','{d.expectedGroundCount}')
